name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description:
Use: Take what is rightfully yours, gorging on your target's essence to deal 3.2 million Shadow damage and healing you for 478,589 over 2 sec. Damage and healing increased based on the target's missing health.

Cooldown reduced by 60 sec if this effect kills the target. (2 Min Cooldown)
Equip: Your damaging spells dispatch a spider to spy on your foes, increasing your Intellect by 70 per report received. Stacks up to 40 times. This effect may only occur every 6 sec.
Use: Use your accumulated knowledge to strike when the time is right, granting 651 Intellect per report for 20 sec and consuming their passive effect. (20 Sec Cooldown)
